mapper.sql: bso.id as bso_id, bso.platform_type as bso_platform_type, bso.version as bso_version, bso.title as bso_title, bso.tips_type as bso_tips_type, bso.attachment as bso_attachment, bso.status as bso_status, bso.author as bso_author, bso.is_del as bso_is_del, bso.create_time as bso_create_time, bso.update_time as bso_update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
from yb_51jk_upgrade bso where platform_type=#{type} and CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() <= DATE_ADD(update_time,INTERVAL 3 DAY ) order by create_time DESC LIMIT 1

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
